title: In the Inland Sea
marks:
Signature, Title, Marks, inscription, and Label
 LRC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida};  LRC, in pencil: [H. Yoshi
description: small scene depicting boats with sails on a calm sea; silhouette of small mountains in background; a few lights from the distant shore reflecting on the water
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
